inclusion.criterion: study staff member will describe the study and offer participation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient agrees to participate, she will sign research protocol and HIPAA consent forms and receive a copy of these forms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient's chart will be flagged, indicating that she is a study participant
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pregnant women undergoing primary or repeat cesarean section
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: maternal age greater than or equal to 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: gestational age greater than or equal to 34 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pain level will be assessed on the first and third or fourth day after surgery and again at six weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient in Arm 1 will have skin closure with staples
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: patient in Arm 2 will have skin closure with 2-0 Prolene in a subcuticular fashion
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: patient in Arm 3 will have skin closure with monocryl or vicryl in the standard fashion
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of drug or alcohol abuse
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion and tested positive for HPV 16. She smokes and drinks alcohol frequently.
